data.message:
My friend got his first item from Gokano and it was totally free!
Gokano is a webpage in which registered users can receive points by filling simple polls. These points can be exchanged to expensive prizes.
Prizes: 
* Sony headphones (60 pts.),
* Galaxy Tab 3 (400 pts.),
* Iphone 6 (1500 pts.) and much more prizes.
Tasks: * 1 point for daily log-in.
* 1 point for daily question (questions are very simple, i.e.:  Water or Soda?)
* 1 point for invited people. (When 30friends registered you get T-shirt and double daily points).
Registration: http://gokano.com/ref/7mkao4kX
